original_title: The Super Simple Show - Space & Planets
overview: The Super Simple show is a compilation of Super Simple's most popular songs and series that our fans love. This compilation is all about Space and Planets. Includes children's song favorites "Mr. Golden Sun", "Skidamarink" and "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" and featuring Carl's Car Wash, The Bumble Nums, Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic, and More.
title: The Super Simple Show - Space & Planets
